levels.description: Healing range <@ba.vup>expands</>, attacks now also heal allied Operators, and ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. If there are ground enemies on sowed tiles, all allied units within skill range gain <@ba.vup>+{e_atk:0%}</> ATK and <@ba.vup>+{e_attack_speed}</> ASPD; When an enemy passes through a sowed tile, it gains the following effect: Teleport back to this location after moving more than <@ba.vup>{max_distance}</> tile(s) away
